biotools.summary: LINflow a computational pipeline that combines an alignment-free with an alignment-based method to accelerate generation of similarity matrices for prokaryotic genomes.  Genomic similarity was first computed as Average Nucleotide Identity (ANI) values based on the alignment of genomic fragments.
